Ardent Sacrifice.effect: Heals adjacent ally 10 HP. Unit loses 10 HP (but cannot reach 0 this way).

Dance.effect: Enables target to take another action. Cannot be used on units with Sing or Dance.

Draw Back.effect: Unit moves 1 space away from target ally, who moves to units former position.

Harsh Command.effect: Converts penalties on target into bonuses.

Martyr.effect: Restores HP=7+ this unit's suffered damage. Unit Heals HP=half suffered damage. Slows Special trigger (cooldown count +1).

Pivot.effect: Unit moves to opposite side of adjacent ally.

Rally Attack.effect: Grants Atk+4 to an adjacent ally until the end of the turn.

Rally Defense.effect: Grants Def+4 to an adjacent ally until the end of the turn.

Rally Resistance.effect: Grants Res+4 to an adjacent ally until the end of the turn.

Rally Speed.effect: Grants Spd+4 to an adjacent ally until the end of the turn.

Reciprocal Aid.effect: Swap HP with adjacent ally (neither unit can go above their max HP).

Reconcile.effect: Restores 7 HP each to target and this unit.

Recover.effect: Restores 15 HP. Slows Special trigger (cooldown count +1).

Rehabilitate.effect: Restores 7 HP or more the further below 50% the target's HP is. Slows Special trigger (cooldown count +1).

Reposition.effect: Moves adjacent ally to opposite side of unit.

Shove.effect: Push adjacent ally 1 space farther away.

Sing.effect: Enables target to take another action. Cannot be used on units with Sing or Dance.

Smite.effect: Push adjacent ally 2 spaces further away.
